name: Project O.C.R
description:
Hello everyone,this is my first try at game-development, so any criticism is much appreciated.

You play as a small Robot that is equipped with a teleporting beam to remove trash from the ocean.

You shoot the teleporting beam by clicking.

You pause the game by pressing ESC or clicking the pause-button on the bottom right.

Also, English isn't my first language, so I'm sorry for any spelling or grammatical mistakes.

This game was made for the SeaJam in support for Team-Seas by Mark Rober and Mr. Beast.

All art/sounds/music used in this game were made by me.

I hope you enjoy my game.
